amendment.description: To modify the approval requirement relating to the promulgation of certain regulations by the Capitol Police Board.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3664 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3664 proposed by Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S9423; text: CR S9423) To modify the approval requirement relating to the promulgation of certain regulations by the Capitol Police Board.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3664 proposed by Senator Campbell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3664 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
